docs.abstract: Letter from Dr Abraham G White says May 24 article is right to note that obesity is major public health problem, but should note also that it is considered addiction and that effective management might include mental health counseling
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your point that obesity is a ''major public health problem'' (editorial, May 24) is well taken. But it is also important to be aware that obesity is considered an addiction like alcoholism.
docs.snippet: To the Editor:    Your point that obesity is a ''major public health problem'' (editorial, May 24) is well taken. But it is also important to be aware that obesity is considered an addiction like alcoholism.
